title: The dollar price of foreign goods

content.question: Suppose that the exchange rate between the United States dollar ($) and the Thai currency, baht <math alttext="open parenthesis, baht, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>฿</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, is <math alttext="1 baht equals, $0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>฿</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>$</mi><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Leticia wants to buy a <math alttext="600 baht" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>฿</mtext><mn>600</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> souvenir from Thailand. What is the souvenir’s price in dollars?

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
